treeharvester-fabric.duskconfig.title: Tree Harvester Config
treeharvester-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_mus: If enabled, tree harvesting only works when a player is holding an axe in the main hand.
treeharvester-fabric.duskconfig.mustHold: Must Hold Axe For Tree Harvest
treeharvester-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_tre: If enabled, tree harvesting works when not holding the sneak button. If disabled it's reversed, and only works when sneaking.
treeharvester-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_ins: If enabled, players instantly break the leaves as well as all logs of the tree when a bottom log is broken.
treeharvester-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_aut: Whether the mod should attempt to find the actual bottom log of the tree and start there. This means you can break a tree in the middle and it will still completely be felled.
treeharvester-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_ena: If enabled, the leaves around a broken tree will quickly disappear. Only works with 'instantBreakLeavesAround' disabled.
If enabled, the warped stem/crimson trees in the nether will also be chopped down quickly.
If enabled, giant/huge mushrooms will also be chopped down quickly.
treeharvester-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_rep: If enabled, automatically replaces the sapling from the drops when a tree is harvested.
If enabled, automatically replaces the sapling from the drops when a huge mushroom is harvested and 'enableHugeMushrooms' is enabled.
treeharvester-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_los: If enabled, for every log harvested, the axe held loses durability.
Here you can set how much durability chopping down a tree should take from the axe. For example if set to 0.1, this means that every 10 logs take 1 durability.
treeharvester-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_inc: If enabled, players' exhaustion level increases 0.005 per harvested log (Minecraft's default per broken block) * increaseExhaustionModifier.
This determines how much exhaustion should be added to the player per harvested log. By default 0.005 * 1.0.
If enabled, harvesting time will increase per existing log in the tree. The amount is determined by 'increasedHarvestingTimePerLogModifier'.
How much longer it takes to harvest a tree with 'increaseHarvestingTimePerLog' enabled. The actual speed is: newSpeed = originalSpeed / (1 + (logCount * increasedHarvestingTimePerLogModifier)).
treeharvester-fabric.duskconfig.increase: Increased Harvesting Time Per Log Modifier
treeharvester-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_amo: How many leaves should be broken per tick after a tree has been harvested. Increasing this will speed up the fast leaf decay, but costs more processing power per tick.
treeharvester-fabric.duskconfig.amountOf: Amount Of Leaves Broken Per Tick
